name: Age of RNGesus
description:
Roll dice to grant blessings to warring kingdoms. Keep them reliant on you and they will build you a monument to last the ages!

My solo submission to the GMTK 2022 Game Jam and a tribute to Age of War, one of my favorite flash games.

Special thanks to Max, Mark & Dillon for helping with flavour text, models & design ideas.
